title: Pyxis (Cylindrical Container)
medium: Stonepaste; luster-painted on incised, opaque white glaze
dimensions:
Bowl: H. 8 in. (20.3 cm)
           Diam. 5 1/2 in. (14 cm)
Lid: H. 3 5/8 in. (9.2 cm)

        Wt. 8.5 oz. (241 g)
creditLine: Purchase, Lila Acheson Wallace Gift, Harvey and Elizabeth Plotnick Gift, and Louis E. and Theresa S. Seley Purchase Fund for Islamic Art, 1998
